Title: Authorizes a mandatory referendum where a legislative body of a local government is amending or adopting local laws relating to an increase in taxes pursuant to state authority
Summary: Authorizes a mandatory referendum where a legislative body of a local government is amending or adopting local laws relating to an increase in taxes pursuant to state authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง23, Munic Home R L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the municipal home rule law, in relation to authorizing a mandatory referendum where a legislative body of a local government is amending or adopting local laws relating to the increase of taxes pursuant to state legislative authority
